name: The Designer Starter Kit
description:
Discover the foundation of good design

This guide is made to help you improve your design skills and learn some fundamental design theory.


What you will find inside:

  • Basics
  • Resources
  • Mini Style Guide Template
  • Examples
  • Principles of Design
  • Laws of UX
  • And more...


I hope that you will enjoy using this guide as much as I enjoyed creating it. There is always room for improvement, so please share your comments/feedback/suggestions.


“Design is a plan for arranging elements in such a way as best to accomplish a particular purpose.”

Charles Eames
